verses.content: Chuongchun, mipuihai chu a hmuin tlângah a lâwn a; chun, a ṭhung a, a inchûktirhai a kuomah an hung a;
chuongchun, thu a hril a, anni ân chuktir a:
“Thlaraua pasiea inhriehai chu an hamṭha; vân ram an ta a ni sih a.
“Thlainvaihai chu an hamṭha; thlamuongin an la um ding a ni sih a.
“Zainêmhai chu an hamṭha; hnuoi ro hi an la hluo ding a ni sih a.
“Felnaa phîngṭâma dangchârhai chu an hamṭha; an la tlai ding a ni sih a.
“Mi chunga zângaitheitakhai chu an hamṭha; zângaina an la hlaw ding a ni sih a.
“Lungrila inthienghai chu an hamṭha; Pathien an la hmu ding a ni sih a.
“Inremna siemtuhai chu an hamṭha; Pathien nauhai inbûkin an la um ding a ni sih a.
“Felna leia suknawmnatna tuor hnunghai chu an hamṭha; vân ram an ta a ni sih a.
“Miin keima leia an hal cheu a, an suknawmna cheu a; khêla suol tinrêngin an hêk pha cheu, in la hamṭha ding a nih.
“Lâwm unla, nasatakin hlim ro; vânah in lâwmman a um râwn sih a; chuong ang bawkin in hmaa zâwlnei umhai khawm an suknawmna hlak kha.
“Hnuoi machi in nih; nisien- lakhawm, machi hi a da ta chun iengin am sukal nâwk an ta? Peihâwna, mihriemhai sir mei mei ding chau naw chun, ienga ding khawmin a ṭha ta nawh.
“Khawvêl var in nih. Tlâng sîpa khaw um chu thuphmang thei a ni nawh.
Mîn khâwnvar sitin leikhâwr hnuoiah an sie ngai nawh; a sienaah an sie lem hlak; chuongchun, in sûnga mi po po a ên hlak.
Chuong ang bawkin in var chu mi mithmuah var raw se; chuong- chun, in thilthaw ṭhathai hmûng an ta, in Pa vâna mi chawimawi thei an tih.
“Dân thu amanih, zâwlneihai thu amanih sukbo dinga hung ka ni ring naw ro, sukbo dinga hung ka ni nawh a, sukkim dinga hung ka ni lem.
Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, hnuoi le vân hi a bo hmakhat chun Dân thua sunhâng chite amanih, thai- hâng chite amanih, pakhat khawm, bo naw tawp a tih, a rênga a tlung kim hmakhat chun.

Chuongchun, tukhawm hieng thupêk laia pakhat, a chîntak khawm bawsea, chuonga thaw ve dinga mihai inchûktir taphawt chu, vân rama chun mi chîn tak tîng an tih; ami- ruokchu, tukhawm zâwma inchûktir taphawt chu, vân rama chun mi lien tîng an tih.
In felnain Dân inchûktirtuhai le Pharisaihai felna a khûm naw chun vân ramah lût naw tawp in tih ti ka hril cheu a ni hi.
“Tienlaia mihai kuoma chun, ‘tuol i that ding a ni nawh,’ ti le, ‘tukhawm tuolthat chu rorêlna hmabâk zingin um a tih’ an tih ti in hriet tah;

kei ruok chun, tukhawm a unau chunga lunginsen taphawt chu rorêlna hmabâk zingin um a tih; chun tukhawm a unau kuoma, ‘Hmang- nabopa’ ti taphawt chu rorêlna hma- bâk zingin um a tih; chun tukhawm, ‘Invêtpa’ ti taphawt chu Hremhmun meia pei hmabâk zingin um a tih ti ka hril cheu hi.
Chuongchun, mâichâm bula i thilpêk în hlân lai taka, i unauin i chungah lungninawna a nei ti i hriet dawk nâwk chun,
chutaka mâichâm hmaa chun i thilpêk chu mâksan la, fe la, i unau rem zet la, chu hnunga chun i thilpêk chu inhlân rawh.

I khingpui chu lampuia in intlawn laiin rem vat rawh; chuong naw chun, i khingpui chun rorêltu inmantir a ti cheh a, rorêltu chun mi man hotu kuomah pêng a ti cheh a, intângna inah khum hlau rawi an ti che.
Titakzetin ka hril che hi, pawisa khat chena i pêk kim nek hma chun, chutaka inthawk chun suok naw tawp i tih.
“ ‘I uire ding a ni nawh,’ an tih ti in hriet tah.
Kei ruok chun, tukhawm nu- hmei dit ena en taphawt chun, a lungrilah a uire zing a nih ti ka hril cheu hi.
Chun, i mit changtiengin a sukthlûk che chun khel dawk la, pei dai rawh; i taksa a puma Hrem- hmuna peia a um nêkin, i taksa pêng pakhat bo chu i ta dingin a ṭha lem a nih.
I kut changtiengin a sukthlûk che chun, tan la, pei dai rawh; i taksa a puma Hremhmuna peia a um nêk chun, i taksa pêng pakhat a bo chu i ta dingin a ṭha lem a nih.
“Chun, ‘Tukhawm nuhmei ma chun inmâkna lekha a kuomah pe raw se,’ an ti bawk a.
Kei ruok chun, tukhawm tlangvâl dit lei ni loa mâni nuhmei ma taphawt chun, ama chu ân uirettir a nih; tukhawm mâk hnung chu nei taphawt chu a uire a nih ti ka hril cheu hi.
“Tienlaia mihai kuoma chun, ‘Khêlin inkhâm naw la, Lalpa kuomah în khâmna chu hlen lem rawh,’ an tih ti in hriet ta bawk a.
Kei ruok chun ka ti cheu hi, vânni hrim hrim khâm naw ro, vân sâlin amanih inkhâm naw ro, achu Pathien Lalṭhungpha a ni sih a; hnuoi sâl khawmin inkhâm naw ro, achu a ke innghatna a ni sih a;
Jerusalem sâlin inkhâm bawk naw ro, achu lal ropuitak khawpui a ni sih a.
I lu sâlin în khâm ding a ni bawk nawh a, samzai pakhat khawm i sukvârin, i sukdum thei si nawh a.
‘A nih,’ in ti chu ‘a nih,’ ni sienla, ‘A ni nawh’ in ti chu ‘a ni nawh’ ni el raw se, chuonghai bâk chu suola inthawka suok a nih.
“ ‘Mit sikah mit, ha sikin ha,’ an tih ti in hriet tah.
Kei ruok chun ka hril cheu hi, mi suol khing naw ro. I bieng changtienga ben taphawt che chu a khing tieng khawm dawpêk lem rawh.
Tukhawmin i kuomah thupawi siemin, i zakuo lâk a tum chun, i puon khawm inlâktir nghâl rawh.
Mêl khat fe dinga phût luitu taphawt che kuoma chun mêl hni fe rawh.
A hnitu che kuoma chun pe la, i kuoma pûk nuomtu chu nghatsan naw.
“ ‘I vênghai hmangai la, i hmêl- ma theida rawh,’ an tih ti in hriet tah.
Kei ruok chun ka hril cheu hi, in hmêlmahai chu hmangai unla; a suk- nawmnatuhai cheu chu ṭawngṭai- pêk ro;
in Pa vâna mi nauhai in ni theina dingin; ama chun mi suolhai le mi ṭhahai chunga chun a nisa ân suoktir a, mi fel le mi fel nawhai chunga khawm ruo ân sûrtir hlak a nih.
A hmangaituhai cheu chau in lunginsiet hin lâwmman ieng am hmûng in ta? Siedâwltuhai khawmin chuong angin an thaw ve a ni naw am a nih?
chun, in unauhai chau chibai in bûk hin a ieng am in thaw tam bik a? Jentailhai khawmin chuong angin an thaw ve a ni naw am a nih?
Chuongchun, in Pa vâna mi a ṭhafamkim angin in ṭhafamkim ding a nih.
